timeline.task: Usage report + MVP user update window

nextJobs.name: Downtime gap auto-fill guard (quiet unless triggered)

findings: Updated gist status payload after release so runtime dashboard data includes `controlRoomVersion: 1.0.0`.
Fixed stale dashboard state where `Current Focus` could show `n/a` and `Now` could remain on old time windows.
Implemented timeline-aware stale fallback in `scripts/lib/status_builder.py` so active/focus/now lanes follow current `DAILY_PLAN.md` window when `TODAY_STATUS.md` lags.
Added tests for stale active-work fallback and timeline-aware now-lane rendering.
Released as patch version `v1.0.1` with tag + GitHub release: https://github.com/SeanKudrna/claw-control-room/releases/tag/v1.0.1

jobSuccessTrend.job: Autonomy daily planner (DAILY_PLAN source of truth)
Downtime gap auto-fill guard (quiet unless triggered)

activity.text: Increased `Control room status publish (gist backend)` cadence from every 20 minutes to every 5 minutes (07:00-22:00 America/Chicago).
Refactored `claw-control-room` from vanilla static JS/CSS into modular React + TypeScript (Vite).
New architecture includes:
`src/components`, `src/hooks`, `src/lib`, `src/types`
typed status fetch layer + polling hook
upgraded UI cards/timeline/jobs/findings layout
Added npm toolchain and dependencies for maintainable UI expansion and easier future agent collaboration.
Updated quality gates to include Python checks + TypeScript typecheck + Vite production build.
Updated docs/contracts/changelog to reflect new architecture and workflow (`handbook/*`, `AGENTS.md`, `README.md`, `CHANGELOG.md`).
GitHub Pages updated to serve built app from `main:/docs`; deployment verified built successfully.
Added requested UI enhancements: now/next/done swimlanes, trend mini charts, and filterable activity feed.
Added visible in-app version badge (header now shows current semver, currently v1.0.0).
Implemented semver release workflow as required:
`scripts/update_and_push.sh --version X.Y.Z --message ...`
bumps version, runs quality gate, commits/pushes, creates `vX.Y.Z` tag, and creates GitHub release from changelog notes.
Added release-notes extraction utility + tests (`scripts/extract_release_notes.py`, `scripts/tests/test_extract_release_notes.py`).
Released and published `v1.0.0`:
Release: https://github.com/SeanKudrna/claw-control-room/releases/tag/v1.0.0
Updated gist status payload after release so runtime dashboard data includes `controlRoomVersion: 1.0.0`.
Fixed stale dashboard state where `Current Focus` could show `n/a` and `Now` could remain on old time windows.
Implemented timeline-aware stale fallback in `scripts/lib/status_builder.py` so active/focus/now lanes follow current `DAILY_PLAN.md` window when `TODAY_STATUS.md` lags.
Added tests for stale active-work fallback and timeline-aware now-lane rendering.
Released as patch version `v1.0.1` with tag + GitHub release: https://github.com/SeanKudrna/claw-control-room/releases/tag/v1.0.1
